plot: Godard has been hired to make a film celebrating the 500th anniversary of Lausanne. This film is his videotaped refusal.
title: Lettre à Freddy Buache
plot_es: Godard has been hired to make a film celebrating the 500th anniversary of Lausanne. This film is his videotaped refusal.
plot_en: Godard has been hired to make a film celebrating the 500th anniversary of Lausanne. This film is his videotaped refusal.
